author: Special Correspondent
text:
The flying squad personnel seized Rs. 5 lakh from the occupants of a van which arrived here from Karnataka on Tuesday morning.

The officials were conducting surprise check of vehicles on the Salem – Bengaluru national highway near the Arabic College when they intercepted the van. The occupants were found to be in possession of the money. They informed the officials that they had brought the money for procuring ground nut and pulses from the Leigh Bazar in Salem city.
title: Rs. 5 lakh seized
